meanings.definition: To bring together again as a couple.
meanings.sent1: After their argument, the couple recouples and goes on a date.
meanings.sent2: Every anniversary, the couple recouples by renewing their vows.
meanings.sent3: The romantic comedy ends with the main characters deciding to recouple after a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Just like puzzle pieces, their hearts recouple perfectly when they are together.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sunset recoupling the sky and the sea is truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: To reunite in a romantic relationship.
meanings.sent1: She recouples with her high school sweetheart after many years apart.
meanings.sent2: The movie plot revolves around two lovers who recouple after a long separation.
meanings.sent3: In the end, the prince and princess recouple and live happily ever after.
meanings.sent4: Their love story is like a fairy tale where the protagonists always recouple despite challenges.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the couple recoupling under the starlit sky is a scene straight out of a romance novel.
